CustomField.description: This field is optional. It is populated by a user or a data integration. The beneficial owner is a sponsored Foreign Financial Institution (FII) without a GIIN number prior to 1/1/16 for purposes of IRS forms W-8 and certifies either (1) that it is an FFI only because it is an investment entity and has an agreement for sponsorship; or (2) that it is a controlled foreign corporation 'as defined by section 957(a).'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The beneficial owner is a sponsored Foreign Financial Institution (FII) without a GIIN number prior to 1/1/16 for purposes of IRS forms W-8
CustomField.label: Form W8 Sponsored FFI Type
